documentation.description: Search API where the search will only be executed after specified checkpoints are available due to a refresh. This API is designed for internal use by the fleet server project.

wait_for_checkpoints.description: Comma separated list of checkpoints, one per shard

allow_partial_search_results.description: Indicate if an error should be returned if there is a partial search failure or timeout

body.description: The search definition using the Query DSL
